item.title: “I Don’t Look Like a Girl When I Tackle People” – Goldberg Shoots at Roman Reigns for Being Soft in the Ring
item.description: “I Don’t Look Like a Girl When I Tackle People” – Goldberg Shoots at Roman Reigns for Being Soft in the Ring WWE Hall of Famer Bill Goldberg recently targeted “The Tribal Chief” Roman Reigns by calling his spear a bit womanlike.
